meanings.sent1: The horse was galloping across the field.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah was galloping after its prey.
meanings.sent3: The children were galloping around the playground, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: Time was galloping by, and soon it was time to go home.
meanings.sent5: The river was galloping down the mountainside, unstoppable and powerful.

meanings.sent1: The galloping pace of the music got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: The galloping carriages rushed through the streets.
meanings.sent3: The galloping clock seemed to be in a hurry to reach midnight.
meanings.sent4: His galloping heartbeat betrayed his nervousness.
meanings.sent5: The galloping storm clouds signaled an approaching thunderstorm.
